data_table.description: Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) Pre Albuterol, Offspring Exam 9 and Omni 1 Exam 4. This spirometry was performed without administration of any inhaler bronchodilator. (In a minority of these subjects, spirometry was repeated after administration of albuterol by inhalation. The post-albuterol spirometry data are contained in a different dataset.)

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: sdt_9_1
variable.comment: Date in dataset includes month , day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.

variable.name: rfvc_9_1
variable.comment: FVC reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Two highest FVC values were not within 0.15 liters (>0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was not met
Two highest FVC values were within 0.15 liters (< = 0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was met

variable.name: rfev_9_1
variable.comment: FEV reproducibility was processed using measurements exported from the PFT machine (raw values with more than two decimals). All measurements were rounded to two decimal places after processing.
variable.value: Two highest FEV values were not within 0.15 liters (> 0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was not met
Two highest FEV values were within 0.15 liters (< = 0.15 L) - Reproducibility criteria was met

variable.name: FV1_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 1 second (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers

variable.name: FV6_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 6 second (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers - Not Best Effort

variable.name: FV3_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume at 3 second (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers - Not Best Effort

variable.name: FVC_9_1
variable.description: Forced Vital Capacity (liters) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers

variable.name: PF_9_1
variable.description: Peak Expiratory Flow (lit./sec.) - Highest value among acceptable maneuvers - Not Best Effort

variable.name: TFVC_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Time (seconds)- Highest FVC value among acceptable maneuvers
variable.comment: TFVC_9_1 is the forced expiratory time of the acceptable maneuver with the highest FVC.

variable.name: RBB_9_1
variable.description: Ratio Best FEV1 / Best FVC (calculated variable)
variable.comment: RBB_9_1 is the ratio of the best FEV1 and the best FVC, which can come from different acceptable efforts. One additional individual with RBB_9_1>0.99 was excluded as values were out of range per PFT Investigator G.O.

variable.name: MMF_9_1
variable.description: Maximum Mid Expiratory Flow Rate (lit./sec.) - Best Effort

variable.name: FF1_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow at 25% of Forced Vital Capacity (lit./sec.) - Best Effort

variable.name: FF2_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow at 50% of Forced Vital Capacity (lit./sec.) - Best Effort
variable.comment: One observation for FF2_9_1 was set to missing as value was out of range per PFT Investigator G.O.

variable.name: FF3_9_1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Flow at 75% of Forced Vital Capacity (lit./sec.) - Best Effort
